com.riskybusiness.neural

Class Trainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskybusiness.neural.Trainer

  • public class Trainer
extends Object

    An independent Object that may be used to help train a NeuralNet or an individual Neuron.

    Since:
    1.6

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trainer(float desiredAnswer, float... inputs)
      Constructs a Trainer object that contains one instance of a desired answer and the inputs used to get that desired answer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the desired answer used for the Trainer.

      Returns the inputs used for the Trainer.
